name: Fatal Flap (itch)
description:
If the HTML version is buggy PLZ use the ANDROID version below.

Have you ever wanted to play Flappy Bird, through the eyes of the bird? In this game you can.

Glamorously glide through pipes and rack up a score, better than your previous best!!

Jump to fly between pipes and don't crash, miss a pipe

CONTROLS:

Click anywhere or space bar to move!
